title: Godrej 236 L Frost Free Double Door 2 Star Refrigerator  (Sleek Steel, RF EON 236B 25 HI SI ST)

product_specification.Other Performance Features: 2.5 L Aqua Space, Dairy Bin, Humidity Controller, Wide Shelves, Sliding Half Shelves, Large Vegetable Tray, Tilting Can Holder
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: 2.5 L Aqua Space, Dairy Bin, Humidity Controller, Wide Shelves, Large Vegetable Tray
product_specification.Technology Used: 100% Green, Anti-B Technology in Gasket, Protects Ozone Layer, Environment Friendly - 100% CFC, HCFC and HFC Free
product_specification.Other Features: 2.5 L Aqua Space, Dairy Bin, Humidity Controller, Wide Shelves, Sliding Half Shelves, Large Vegetable Tray, Tilting Can Holder, Polybag Suspender, Cool Shower|Tilting Can Holder, 100% Green, Anti-B Technology in Gasket, Protects Ozone Layer, Environment Friendly - 100% CFC, HCFC and HFC Free
product_specification.Installation & Demo: Authorised Service Engineer will install the Refrigerator, make it operational and explain the below details. 1. How to Use, 2. Features,3. Do's and Dont's. Call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance Or text "Hi" to 9321665511 on WhatsApp
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on product and 10 Years Warranty on Compressor from Godrej
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Refrigerator comes with a 10 yr warranty on compressor and 1 yr warranty on all other parts (except bulb, glass and add on plastic parts) from the date of purchase, against defective material and good workmanship.In the warranty period beyond the first year of purchase , only the compressor will be provided free of cost.However , the appliance will be repaired on payment of necessary charges.
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty:
Incase, the appliance or any part is subjected to neglect, abuse or misuse , tampering, alteration or any other acts of God, or damage by rodents and insects
Warranty automatically expires after the stipulated period of original purchase even if the refrigerator was not in use for anytime for whatsoever reasons
Warranty does not cover/is not applicable
In case of original number (Serial no., sticker) is removed obliterated or altered from the machine or cabinet
The company is not responsible for any damage caused to the appliances and shall not be liable for any consequential loss or compensation nor refund of purchase price or replacement

product_description.Large Vegetable Tray: Thanks to its spacious vegetable tray, the Godrej EON 236 L Double-door Refrigerator lets you stock plenty of greens, herbs, fresh veggies, and fruits without any storage hassles.
product_description.Removable Antibacterial Gasket: This refrigerator’s door is fitted with an antibacterial gasket that curbs germs and bacteria from entering, keeping the food fresh and hygienic. Also, as the gasket is removable, you can wash it with ease.

review: Its y nice product fab five star and it cool is also very nice thank you Flipkart 👍👍👍👍I am loving with the product fabbbbbbb..

Happy to buy an Indian product. Received a good dark grey metallic tone refrigerator. The handle gives a good look. Delivery & installation was quick . Double door in this budget is worth it. Quality is pretty decent too.

After several search for perfect product finaly i found and got from Flipkart . Fridge received yesterday as prompted one day in advance , following are the highlights as per my experience !

PROS:
1) Worth for money : At this price really happy and reasonable exchange value got .

2) Features: coming to the features there is manual controllable things like quick freeze , Refrigerator and Free maximum air control, humidity control and noticeable .

3) Frost Free operation

4) silent operation in initial
NB: *Performance and operational side will be update after 3 months or more usage !!!*

5) Delivery team so cooperative and delivery was professional deserves 5 *

Cons :

NO Freezer Light and light not reaching all point after loading things !

Cooling : Its take more time than old fridge to get cooled like ice water , and liquid things may be its new product thats why taking time ( will observe )

Plastics : Plastic used area looks cheaper


INSTALLATION : Flipkart initially shown 17 th Engineer will come and install. My question is for 5 days where will we store our things ? Also no contact number in notification . Fortunately Today he came and inspected that also surprised .

Suggestion: Please arrange the Engineer on the day of delivery if its for fridge / washing machine/ Tv etc

Thanks Flipkart and Delivery Team
Happy customer

My Mom loved it. Delivery service and installation service both deserve five star. As per performance it's still less than a week we started using it till now we are quite satisfied. It keeps vegetables and fruits fresh. Sometime it makes loud noise maybe be because of voltage. Overall it's very good.
Facing lot's of problem after using one month
nice product, but couldn't find 5 star rating for electricity usage, only 2 star was available

Writing this review after using it for over 3 weeks.
So far, no issue observed. Cooling is great and very comfortably runs on inverter. I've tested it for 12 hrs on inverter and it has given very satisfactory results. Freezer gives instant cooling enough to get ice in an hour. Ice tray design is such that just twist and you'll have a handful ice cubes in your tray. It has cooling distributor from where we can adjust where we need more cooling i.e., in freezer section or in lower compartment. Just one con that it has no light in freezer.
Now come to lower section, where it has enough space, cooling controller & best part is it's white light.
I really liked it.
Final verdict, the best product in this price range. Go for it without thinking twice. One proud puchase as it's a made in India product.

Only 3 months completed. Now itself the fridge door not locking properly. The beeding quality is not up to the mark in door. It's better to purchase fridge by physical verification at nearby stores.

Now no way, I have adjust with this for few more years. Feeling sad with this quality.😎😎

Reviewed after 20 days of usage:
Got the refrigerator during sale @13500 including exchange and credit card discount.
Pros:
1. Ample of space for vegetables and other items.
2. Enough of space in ice box for ice, icecream and other frozen items.
3. Good door space for bottles and keeping other door items.
4. Hardened glass looks and feels very durable and long lasting.
5. Mostly very silent operation, except when the refridgerator is turned on for the first time.
6. Nice and efficient cooling. Prepares ice within an hour or so.


Cons:
None as of now.

Conclusion:
The refridgerator is really nice with quick and efficient cooling and has enough space for keeping food for 2-3 people.
The material of inside body is not great. I suggest go to store and buy

Better than Best
1 Fast cooling
2 Inverter compressor so less noise
3 Compare to size very spacious. More spacious than most of 160 lit capacity
4 well finished and elegant look
5 What more at this price range?
